articles.author: Bill Trott
articles.title: Tony Bennett, legendary American singer, dies at age 96 - Reuters
articles.description: Tony Bennett, the smooth American singer who had an enduring hit with "I Left My Heart in San Francisco" and remained perpetually cool enough to win over younger generations of fans well into the 21st century, died on Friday, his publicist said.
articles.content: July 21 (Reuters) - Tony Bennett, the smooth American singer who had an enduring hit with "I Left My Heart in San Francisco" and remained perpetually cool enough to win over younger generations of fa… [+6369 chars]
